author: gartung
body:
### Description

Enable OneDNN memory debug in Tensorflow. Setting this option disables some "features" of OneDNN stack tracing
https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/blob/1e3bc8d0b92e845a186bf0c23eccee187eb5eb81/src/cpu/x64/jit_generator.hpp#L211
https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/blob/1e3bc8d0b92e845a186bf0c23eccee187eb5eb81/src/cpu/x64/jit_generator.hpp#L296

and enables zeroing of registers
https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/blob/1e3bc8d0b92e845a186bf0c23eccee187eb5eb81/src/cpu/x64/jit_generator.hpp#L211
title: Enable OneDNN memory debug in Tensorflow
